# location(in:)

**Instance Method**

Indicates the location of the touch in the view’s coordinates.

## Declaration

```swift
func location(in view: NSView?) -> NSPoint
```

## Getting the Touch Location

- **previousLocation(in:)**: Indicates the previous location of the touch in the view’s coordinates.

items.description: Indicates the previous location of the touch in the view’s coordinates.
